isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT, CONNECTING RODS AND PISTONS - Connecting Rods, Pistons and Piston Rings - Inspection

step1.para: Inspect the pistons for scuffed or scored skirts, cracked or worn ring lands, and cracked or scuffed pin bores. Replace as required.

note.para: Faulty piston rings cannot always be detected by visual inspection. Therefore, whenever a piston is removed from a cylinder, it is recommended that the piston rings be replaced.

step1.para: Inspect the new piston rings for cleanliness.
Inspect the connecting rod studs for nicks or damage.
Inspect the connecting rod and cap mating surfaces for fretting. The bore must be smooth and free of scoring or nicks. Replace as required.
Inspect the piston pins for corrosion or wear. Replace as required.
